Play the car with PythonÂ¶

There are two ways to play for python users to learn and use ESP-4WD Car: Code Control and APP Control. You can directly use python code to control the car, or DIY a remote control.

It should be noted that before using APP Control, you need to understand Code Control first.

  • Code Control
    • move
    • ultrasonic
    • grayValue
    • flashingLight
    • waterfallLight
    • measureSpeed
    • morePlay
    • Startup at boot
  • APP control
    • Install Sunfounder Controller
    • About Sunfounder Controller
    • Establish communication
    • APP Operation
    • DIY Remote Control
